title: Spinergy launches MTX wheelsets for MTB, MTXe wheels for eMTB
content:
Foam-filled carbon rims, synthetic fiber spokes and e-bike specific wheel components? Spinergy is rolling out some nifty technology with their new MTX and MTXe mountain bike wheelsets. With varying rim widths, two hub models and two types of spokes these three new wheelsets cover everyoneâ€™s needs, from XC racers to trail shredders and eMTB riders.

The post Spinergy launches MTX wheelsets for MTB, MTXe wheels for eMTB appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
